original_text: Then, because so many people were coming and going that they did not even have a chance to eat, he said to them, “Come with me by yourselves to a quiet place and get some rest.”
korean_text: 이르시되 너희는 따로 한적한 곳에 가서 잠깐 쉬어라 하시니 이는 오고 가는 사람이 많아 음식 먹을 겨를도 없음이라

sentences.original_text: Then, because so many people were coming and going
sentences.korean_translation: 그때, 너무 많은 사람들이 오고 가고 있었기 때문에

sentences.original_text: that they did not even have a chance to eat
